name: dat-docs
description: Documentation for Dat and the surrounding ecosystem.

scripts.update: npm run update:list && npm run update:docs
scripts.update:list: curl -Ssl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clkao/awesome-dat/master/readme.md | grep 'ðŸ“”' | egrep -o 'github.com/[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+/[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+' | cut -f 2- -d / | uniq > repos.txt
scripts.update:build: cat repos.txt | ecosystem-docs sync && cat repos.txt | ecosystem-docs read | node build.js
scripts.build:local: npm run build:css && minidocs docs -c docs/contents.json -i welcome -o dist  -l ./node_modules/dat-design/downloads/dat-data-logo.png -t 'Dat Data' -s assets/styles.css --pushstate
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:css && minidocs docs -c docs/contents.json -i welcome -o dist -l ./node_modules/dat-design/downloads/dat-data-logo.png -t 'Dat Data' -s assets/styles.css --full-html
scripts.deploy: npm run build:deploy && echo docs.dat-data.com > dist/CNAME && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.paper: pandoc --variable author="Maxwell Ogden, Karissa McKelvey, Mathias Buus" --variable title="Dat - Distributed Dataset Synchronization And Versioning" --variable date="Version 1.0.0, May 2016" --variable classoption=twocolumn --variable papersize=a4paper -s dat-paper.md -o dat-paper.pdf
